name: Proof of Trust
description: Upon use, immediately recovers 3 Technique Points for the team.
story:
A souvenir that {NICKNAME} sells on {TEXTJOIN#87}. The inspiration came from {F#her}{M#his} personal experiences. Every time {NICKNAME} talks about the history of this medal, {F#her}{M#his} eyes shimmer with tears.

"He was my king, and the shepherd of all existence's waste. Upon his throne, he aided the humble cans and humbled the vile cans..."
